metadata.title: CVE-2022-0686 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key in NPM url-parse prior to1.5.8.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0686` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.5.9+~1.4.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.9+~1.4.8-1').
